item.description: Address: 1955 Rue Duff Court, Lachine, QC, Canada, H8S Salles de bain (nb) 1 salle de bain <br />À louer par Propriétaire <br />Meublé Non <br />Animaux acceptés Non <br />Description <br />Très beau 3 1/2 fraichement rénové au goût du jour (nouvelle salle de bain, cuisine, peinture, plancher sablé et verni), bien éclairé (hauts plafonds et grandes fenêtres), au 2e étage d'un triplex. Immeuble occupé par le propriétaire depuis 15 ans, donc très bien entretenu avec beaucoup de rénovations à l'intérieur et l'extérieur. <br /> <br />- Emplacement de choix: 10 mins de marche au métro Fabre (ligne bleue), 10 mins en bus au métro Jarry (ligne orange) - 2 mins à pied à l'arrêt de bus. <br /> <br />Plusieurs dépanneurs, garderies, grand parc, pharmacie Uniprix et l'école primaire juste à côté. <br /> <br />Quelques minutes de marche au supermarché IGA, l'hôpital Jean-Talon ainsi que les restos et pleins d'autres services sur l'avenue Papineau, Jean-Talon et Jarry. <br /> <br />À proximité du plus grand marché public Jean-Talon et l'épicerie asiatique KimFat. <br /> <br />Accès facile à l'autoroute 40, à Laval ou à Longueuil via ave Papineau. <br /> <br />- Nous cherchons le locataire calme, propre, respectueux, non fumeur. Idéal pour étudiant universitaire (HEC, Université de Montréal ...) et/ou jeune professionnel/professionnelle. Aucun animal permis. <br /> <br />- Libre immédiate. Références demandées. Contactez par téléphone svp! Bienvenu!!!

item.description: Address: 550 Riverfront Ave Se, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2G Large Downtown Condo in Vantage Pointe featuring 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom luxury in prime location. This unit features 9ft ceilings throughout and is located on the 11th floor with unobstructed views of the mountains combined with lots of natural sunlight. Enjoy the open concept kitchen that features granite countertops with a raised eating bar, dark cabinets and a full suite of appliances (fridge, stove, dishwasher and hood fan). Additional unit features include in-suite laundry, secure underground parking, air conditioning and a covered deck with BBQ hookup. Building features include a fitness facility, bike storage area, lots of guest parking, video surveillance and night-time security. <br /> <br />The new C-train line is located a few blocks away and the Mid-town Market Co-op is located across the parking lot making grocery shopping a pleasure. <br /> <br />Rent of $1700 / month includes all utilities (heat, water, electricity) and one heated underground parking stall. item.title: 2 br loaded, 306-1804 Henderson
item.address: 2727 Portage Ave, Winnipeg, MB, Canada, R3J 0R
item.description: Address: 2727 Portage Ave, Winnipeg, MB, Canada, R3J 0R Henderson and McIvor. Sublet for Nov 1st. Current lease expires July 31, 2016. $948 per month $20 for parking. Parking located immediately outside front door. This apartment is a dream. Features are highlighted by a 12 Ft vaulted ceiling in the sunken living room, and opens up the dining room giving it that eating at Moxies feel. Fire up the wood burning fireplace, and pour yourself a glass of wine. The post dinner clean up is a breeze, just let the built in dishwasher and garburator do the work. I hope you have alot of clothes, the 8 ft deep walk in closet in the large master br hates being lonely. Keep it happy and store your "I know I'll use it someday" items in the 9 x 7 storage closet, or if your not a boderline hoarder like me, its another giant walk in. Keep your cool in the heat of summer and survive the deep freeze with central heating/ac set the furnace to just how you like it. Take a dip in the residents+guest heated pool or just relax on your private balcony, you just don't want to miss this apartment. <br /><br />Thanks everyone for your interest. <br /><br />*there is no laundry in suite - it is located in a common area <br />Water is inlcuded, heat hydro is extra as you have your own furnace A/c very convenient<br />This ad was posted from the Kijiji app.<br />You can download the app from Google Play.

Open house hours:</p><p>Monday to Friday: 12 PM - 1 PM<br />Saturday: 11 AM - 12 PM<br /><br />Call 613-724-3900 to RSVP!<br /><br />The open house will meet at 1196 Shillington.</p><p>Stop by during our open house hours or call us to book a time that fits YOUR schedule!<br /><br />Bachelor Apartment Available at 1276 Dorchester from $850!<br /><br />1 Bedroom Apartment Available at 1030 Hollington from $839!<br />1 Bedroom Apartment Available at 1073 Hollington from $899!<br />1 Bedroom Apartment Available at 1196 Shillington from $929!<br />1 Bedroom Apartment Available at 1276 Dorchester from $899!<br />1 Bedroom Apartment Available at 1000 Silver from $849!<br /><br />2 Bedroom Apartment Available at 1230-1240 Emperor from $1099!</p><p>Arbor Village is a multi-complex residential community, offering studio, one, and two bedroom apartments for rent in West-Ottawa. Recent renovations to kitchens and bathrooms feature new countertops, vanities, fixtures, lighting and appliances. The Property’s central location provides easy vehicle access to and from all parts of Calgary. The Property is conveniently situated approximately a 10 minute drive southwest of the central business district. Uptown 17th Avenue has over 200 upscale boutiques stretched over a dozen city blocks. The Avenue is regularly walked by thousands of Calgarians and tourists alike, whether for shopping or to frequent some of Calgary’s trendiest cocktail bars, sports pubs or coffee shops.</p><p>Hollyburn residents enjoy exclusive savings and benefits from our value-added partners, including Shaw, Costco, Car2Go, Maple Leaf Storage, AspenClean, and Frogbox.</p><br/><br/>Please call: 1-587-316-1039 for more information. <br/>Images in this ad may or may not be exact representation of the vacant suite. <br/>Professionally Managed by Hollyburn Properties Limited.

item.description: Address: 12507 Stony Plain Rd NW, Edmonton, AB, Canada, T5N 1T3 Available October 17. 2015 <br /> <br />This beautiful newly renovated, bright and sunny, fully furnished basement suite is located in the central west district of Edmonton in the desirable Woodcroft neighbourhood. Ideally situated one block off Groat Road and just minutes from The River Valley and Downtown. One minute’s walk and you are at the main bus terminal with direct and quick access to the University and NAIT. It’s a great place to call home during your stay in Edmonton! <br /> <br />*** Enjoy your own private entrance and large patio and backyard with fruit and decorative trees. <br /> <br />*** The suite has been professionally designed and decorated with quality furnishings that create a cozy and inviting space. <br /> <br />*** The bright kitchen has everything you need to make a delicious home cooked meal and the backsplash features hand-made artistic tile imported from Mexico! <br /> <br />*** Make yourself at home as you relax on your comfy couch and watch a movie on TV or Netflix. <br /> <br />*** The bathroom has an inviting shower and private washer and dryer. Bright colourful towels are included. <br /> <br />*** Your comfort is very important to us and that is why the spacious bedrooms is equipped with everything you need for a great night's sleep including bed sheets, pillows, comforters and a very spacious closet for all your personal items! <br /> <br />*** You have plenty of room to work on our spacious executive desk. <br /> <br />*** You are walking distance from a major shopping centre. You will be situated near major transit routes with easy access to the University and Hospitals. Plus you are just minutes by car from downtown Edmonton. The home is located just a few blocks off the 124 street area, which is a trendy shopping district featuring varied entertainment and many restaurants. With Edmonton boasting the largest green space for a North American city you will be sure to appreciate your close proximity to The River Valley Trails with beautiful walking trails and bike paths. <br /> <br />*** Peter Hemingway Recreation Centre minutes' walk away, 50 meter swimming pool and fitness facilities. <br /> <br />*** Private parking and garage are available. <br /> <br />To make your transition as easy as possible our fully furnished rentals include EVERYTHING... utilities, cable, high speed internet, dishes, cookware, microwave, coffee maker, toaster, towels, bedding, flat screen TV and iPod dock. <br /> <br />*** $600/ week <br />*** $1600 / month <br />*** $1450/ month on 3 month lease <br /> <br />For an additional fee, weekly cleaning can be arranged. <br /> <br />*** 1400 dollar Security deposit required. <br />For stays of a month

item.title: DNA1 - Rustic Townhouse Loft at King & Shaw
item.address: 1 Shaw, Toronto, ON, Canada, M6K 0A
item.description: Address: 1 Shaw, Toronto, ON, Canada, M6K 0A Gorgeous and modern 1+den loft at King & Shaw with a rustic look, including exposed concrete floors and ceilings. The unit features 10ft' concrete ceilings, granite countertops, gas stove,a functional use of space with open concept living and dining, a walk-out to patio from living area or master bedroom with rarely seen townhouse style walk-out to street-level.<br /><br /> This highly sought-after building is located in the heart of Toronto's King West neighborhood. It's in the same building as Starbucks and RBC, accross from the new Independent Grocer, It is mere steps the entertainment district's great restaurants and bars, and a short commute to the financial district, ACC and Rogers center. With a walkability score of 95 and a transit score of 100, you'll have no trouble getting the most out of downtown Toronto life!<br /><br /> Building amenities include a rooftop lounge with BBQs and a spectacular view of the downtown skyline, fitness center, yoga/aerobic room, party room, 24Hr concierge & visitor parking<br /><br /> Available immediately. Parking and locker available for an extra cost.

item.title: Superbe condo - 2 terrasses - mezzanine - Novembre
item.address: 12435 Gouin Ouest Blvd, Pierrefonds, QC, Canada, H8Z 1W
item.description: Address: 12435 Gouin Ouest Blvd, Pierrefonds, QC, Canada, H8Z 1W Magnifique condo neuf clé en main sur 2 étages. Construction 2013, espace convivial à aire ouverte au salon, salle à manger et cuisine. Possède une chambre mezzanine avec grandes fenêtres et terrasses de chaque côté. Cette propriété saura vous combler par la qualité et la beauté des matériaux, la luminosité et sa grande superficie de balcons! <br /> <br />Au rdc (3e étage) : Salon à aire ouverte sur salle à manger et cuisine avec grande fenestration offrant une très bonne luminosité. Bel escalier de boiserie et fer forgé avec une belle hauteur de plafond (2 étages) agrandissant l’aire ouverte. Rangement intelligent adéquat pour un condo à Montréal comprenant un grand garde-manger, petite salle de lavage, rangement sous l’escalier, etc. Comptoirs en quartz (cuisine et salle de bain), impressionnant mur de bois haut de deux étages et balcon donnant sur cour intérieure. Chic salle de bain comprenant un bain-douche en céramique et porte vitrée avec robinetterie de type « pluie » et téléphone. <br /> <br />Mezzanine (4e étage) : Chambre à coucher comprenant deux murs de fenestration sur pleine largeur, donnant sur deux grandes terrasses privées de chaque côté et offrant une vue sur la ville et le stade olympique. Terrasses en planches composites ne demandant aucun entretien. <br />Autre : Locker privé au sous-sol. Possibilité d’acheter un stationnement intérieur. Fenêtres hybrides de bonne qualité (Vaillancourt). Excellente isolation thermique et sonore. Échangeur d’air. Réseau d’aspirateur central installé. Conduits et électricité déjà passé pour l’installation d’un climatiseur. Système d’alarme installé. <br /> <br />Ce condo sera vous enchanter avec ses planchers de bois de bois francs, sa fenestration procurant un éclairage naturel et ses grandes terrasses qui agrandissent nettement la superficie habitable. <br />Inclus : unité de garde-robe dans la chambre, tous les luminaires <br /> <br />Location avec option d'achat - Appeler Marc-André: 514-953-8604

item.title: Premier Condo-Style Apartment with Professional Resident Manager
item.address: 1265 Burnaby St, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6e 1P
item.description: Address: 1265 Burnaby St, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6e 1P <p align="center">Hendry House<br/><p align="center">1265 Burnaby St, Vancouver<br/><p align="center">1-604-757-5248<br/><p align="center">Price: $1475<br/><p align="center">Available: November 01, 2015 <br/><br/>For more photos and information, copy/paste the link below to our website<br/>http://www.hollyburn.com/rental-apartments/hendry-house </p><br/><br/><p>Suite Features:</p> 1 bedroom Bright and spacious layout Hardwood, laminate, or carpet floors White quartz, granite, or laminate countertops Stove and fridge appliances (some also with dishwasher) Mirror or wood closet doors Updated kitchen and bathroom (some also fully renovated with contemporary style fixtures) Balcony<p>Building Features:</p> Bright and sunny apartments with balconies Spectacular ocean and mountain views Outdoor swimming pool Fitness centre 24-hour laundry facility Free wi-fi in common areas Gated underground parking Professional on-site Resident Managers Centrally located near English Bay Heat and hot water included No pets 1 year lease Unfurnished<br/><br/>Building Description<br/><br/><p>Steps from the buzz of Davie Street, Hendry House offers one and two bedroom West End rental apartments with balconies featuring magnificent views of downtown Vancouver and the city’s famed English Bay. With an outdoor swimming pool, a gym and a bicycle room, these apartments for rent make life easy and stylish for residents. Underground gated parking and hardwood floors in some suites, large windows, dishwashers and modern finishes mean your home is stylish and contemporary. Minutes from downtown Vancouver, Hendry House is in the enviable position of offering a complete city lifestyle, with quick access to Stanley Park, the beach, the skyscrapers of the financial district and the trendy stores on Robson. But it’s the sunsets that will entice you home at the end of the day, a spectacular sight that makes Hendry House a true treasure.</p><p>Hollyburn residents enjoy exclusive savings and benefits from our value-added partners, including Shaw, Costco, Falkins Insurance, Modo Car Co-op, Maple Leaf Storage, English Bay Bike Rentals, AspenClean, Frogbox, and Jiffy Move.</p><br/><br/>Please call: 1-604-757-5248 for more information. <br/>Images in this ad may or may not be exact representation of the vacant suite. <br/>Professionally Managed by Hollyburn Properties Limited.

The master bedroom is spacious and includes a closet organizer. Laminate and tile floors throughout. One small pet (cat or dog under 20lbs) may be permitted upon approval from the condo board.

item.description: Address: 7546 Boulevard Des Laurentides, Laval, QC, Canada, H7H <p> </p><p> </p>Plateau Mont Royal -- 3 ½  complètement meublés avec tous les services<p> </p><p>Dans un immeuble très sécuritaire et propre, nous avons des 3 ½ de disponibles.</p><p>Nos unités sont meublés et équipés avec goût et incluent tous les services essentiels.</p><p>Donc, tout le confort et les commodités d’un hotel, mais à une fraction du prix.</p><p> </p><p>Et n’oubliez pas que nous sommes à proximité du centre ville de Montréal, là où vous trouverez tous services, boutiques et restaurants haut de gamme, et notre incomparable vie nocturne.</p><p> </p><p>Pour renseignements et/ou réservations, SVP appelez au 514-999-9143</p><p>On peut nous joindre par courriel au;  basile@montrealliving.info</p><p>Notre site web : www.montrealliving.info</p><p><br />  ***NicPromotion***</p><p> </p><p> </p><p> </p><p> </p><p> </p><p>Plateau Mont Royal -- completely furnished (3 ½) with all services</p><p> </p><p>In a very safe and clean building, we have 3 ½ available.</p><p>Our units are furnished and equipped with taste and include all the essential services.</p><p>So, all the comfort and conveniences of a hotel, but at a fraction of the price.</p><p> </p><p>And do not forget that we are close to downtown Montreal, where you will find all services, high end boutiques/shops/restaurants and our unparalleled nightlife.</p><p> </p><p>For information and / or reservations, please call 514-999-9143</p><p>We can be reached by e-mail at; basile@montrealliving.info</p><p>Our website; www.montrealliving.info</p><p> </p><p>***NicPromotion***</p><p></p><p> </p><p> </p><p> </p><p> </p><p> </p><p> </p><p> </p><p> </p><p> </p>

item.title: PENTHOUSE - CENTRE-VILLE - TERRASSE - NOUVEAU COLISÉE
item.address: 14341 Forsyth, Pointes Aux Tremble, QC, Canada, h1a1h3
item.description: Address: 14341 Forsyth, Pointes Aux Tremble, QC, Canada, h1a1h3 NOUVEAU COLISÉE <br /> <br />Le PENTHOUSE <br />Magnifique PENTHOUSE perché au coeur de l'action urbaine. Ce grand 3½ de 860pi2 possède un accès d'ascenceur à l'étage des penthouses avec clé personnalisé et sécurisé. Avec deux salles de bain, les élctroménagers en stainless et une buanderie à l'étage pour offrir un confort ménager sans précédant. Possédant une terrasse de 300pi2 pour profiter d'une vue exeptionnel sur Montréal. Tout inclus (Chauffage, électricité, eau chaude) avec climatisation et espace de stationnement fourni. <br /> <br />Le NOUVEAU COLISÉE <br />Situé en plein cœur du centre-ville, à deux pas du métro Place-des-arts, du quartier des spectacles et de l’Université McGill, Le Nouveau Colisée se rattache à l’éclectique quartier du centre-ville et plonge ses résidents dans la réputée faune urbaine de Montréal. <br /> <br /> <br />Les SERVICES <br />En plus de sa proximité à un secteur fleurissant d’activités, Le Nouveau Colisée offre un vaste éventail de services à même l’immeuble. Elle vous propose une piscine chauffée en plus de ses saunas. Vous retrouvez toutes les commodités nécessaires au bon fonctionnement de vos tâches ménagères, comme par exemple la buanderie et sa vingtaine de machines fréquemment inspectées, disponible 24h/24. Plus d’une centaine d’espaces de stationnements chauffés sont à votre disposition, ainsi que des espaces à vélo. <br /> <br />Vous y retrouverez un personnel attentif, à l’écoute des besoins des locataires et ce jour comme nuit. Qu’il soit question de réparations mineures comme majeures, de l’entretien quotidien de l’équipement et des espaces communs, l’équipe du Nouveau Colisée offre un service personnalisé et adéquat en tout temps. <br /> <br />Le bâtiment est également sécurisé au moyen de caméras de sécurités parcourant les couloirs, le lobby, les aires communes, le garage, les ascenseurs et les enceintes de l’immeuble. Le tout surveillé par notre équipe du jour et par nos gardiens de nuit effectuant des rondes régulières pour assurer la quiétude de nos locataires.

item.title: Superbe 5 1/2 Rosemont Petite-patrie à deux pas de la rue Masson
item.address: 9425 Boulevard LaSalle, LaSalle, QC, Canada, H8R 2M8
item.description: Address: 9425 Boulevard LaSalle, LaSalle, QC, Canada, H8R 2M8 Bonjour à tous, <br /> <br />C'est avec regret que je cède le bail de mon superbe 5 1/2 sur la rue Lafond au coin de Dandurand. À deux pas de la rue Masson et à 10 minutes de trois lignes de métro (verte, orange et bleu). Avec le bus express #67 sur la rue St-Michel direction nord, vous arrivez en 5 minutes à la station St-Michel sur la ligne bleu et en direction sud, entre 5-10 minutes à la station Joliette sur la ligne verte. Vous êtes également à 10 minutes de la station Rosemont sur la ligne orange en prenant le bus #197. (Pour donner un exemple, je suis à 20-25 minutes de l'UdeM et de l'UQAM, 25-30 minutes du centre-ville et environ 35 minutes de l'ETS) <br /> <br />L'appartement contient 3 vraies chambres fermées dont une ayant accès à un balcon privé, une garde-robe dans chacune des chambres, beaucoup de rangement, un très grand salon, une cuisine entièrement rénovée avec entrée laveuse/sécheuse et lave-vaisselle (nous aimerions par le fait même vendre le nôtre qui est déjà installé et en parfaite condition) et de belles grandes fenêtres, donc très lumineux. <br /> <br />Il y a également un balcon arrière pour les amateurs de BBQ. L'appartement est situé au dernier étage d'un triplex très tranquille, donc personne qui vous marche sur la tête. Les propriétaires sont respectueux, soucieux et très accomodants. Le loyer est de 1050$/mois rien d'inclus et il est disponible à partir de maintenant, mais nous sommes flexibles quant à la date d'arrivée. Bien entendu, possibilité de renouveler le bail au mois de juillet prochain. <br /> <br />Si ça vous intéresse ou si vous avez des questions, n'hésitez surtout pas à m'écrire, on pourra planifier une petite visite sans problème. Les photos parlent d'elles-mêmes, c'est un appartement à ne pas manquer! :) <br /> <br />Mathieu <br /> <br />(Visite jeudi le 8 octobre entre 13h et 21h)

item.title: Furnished, Bright layouts, balcony, gorgeous views, location...
item.address: 1881 Brunswick Street, Halifax, NS, Canada, B3J 3L
item.description: Address: 1881 Brunswick Street, Halifax, NS, Canada, B3J 3L Furnished Apartment for Rent in Halifax<br /><br />This property is part of the new community of Brunswick Heights. Discover new commercial storefronts, new green spaces, streetscaping, and street lighting. Steps from Citadel Hill, downtown and the waterfront, Brunswick Heights is at the centre of everything, just a few steps above it all.<br /><br />Key Property Details<br />At the Heart of the Harbour District!Access for a fee to: Community Heated Indoor Swimming Pool, Sauna, & Fitness Centre!Fully Furnished Suites Available<br />Property Features<br />BalconyCable ReadyElevatorFitness CenterFridge / StoveLaundry RoomOn Site ManagementParkingPoolSaunaSecurity CamerasSecurity PatrolsStorage<br />Detailed Property Information<br />From the heart of the citys most sought-after district, everything downtown Halifax has to offer is within easy walking distance of Halifax Apartments a cluster of three quality rental apartments at the heart of the Harbour district, located at1881 Brunswick Street<br /><br />Sizes range from one-bedroom to three-bedroom suites. Fully furnished suites are available at The Plaza. <br /><br />Halifax Apartments offers appealing amenities like an indoor swimming pool, hot tub and sauna, a fully equipped fitness centre, mini mart and business centre as well as direct indoor access to the pedway. <br /><br />Natural light streams in through the glass enclosure around the indoor pool. Get in a workout, or just splash around to relax and re-energize. To take your relaxation one step further, try the sauna or the whirlpool. <br /><br />The fitness centre has everything you need to stay in shapeweights, treadmills, elliptical machines, stationary bikes and more. Lockers and showers are available.<br /><br />Spend the afternoon in your favourite lawn chair on the deck, or catch the sunset over the Harbour. <br /><br />The Halifax Harbour area is the cultural centre of this lively city, and Halifax Apartments is at its heart, making it easy for you to take full advantage of this ideal location. Restaurants to suit all tastes and budgets, museums, historic sites, markets and shoppingeven a casinoare all within a few minutes walk. The sun and salt air, the fresh breezes, the boardwalk, the nearby beaches: the sights and sounds of this vibrant district will fill your senses. <br /><br /><br />Additional Property Information<br />PoolWhirlpoolSaunaAccess to Fitness Centre (for a fee)Some Suites with BalconiesUnderground parkingSecurity system and regular building patrols are a reassuring presenceStaff are on call 24 hours a day to respond to residents needsClose to ShoppingLaundry On SiteSome suites with Propane fireplacesPrivate balconiesHardwood and vinyl tile flooringAmple storage areasClose to Public

item.description: Address: 785 Rue Chabrier, Laval, QC, Canada, H7S 2L1 APPARTEMENT 3 1/2 A LOUER MOIS DE NOVEMBRE 2015.<br /><br /><br />***PERSONNE AVEC EMPLOI SEULEMENT***<br /><br />Addresse : 204 St Remi, Montreal, Quebec, H4C 3E8<br /><br />*SVP LISEZ ATTENTIVEMENT POUR EVITEZ LES APPELS INUTILES*<br /><br />Un tres beau appartement propre et spacieux renove , avec tout nouveau plancher, porte et fenetre.La peinture a ete refaite egalement. Il possede 1 chambre a coucher fermer, 1 salle de bain ayant un placard pour les machines electromenagers (Laveuse/Secheuse). Un grand salon spacieux combiner avec la cuisine. Il n'y a pas de salle separement juste pour la cuisine. En plus, il y a une cours arriere, qui peut etre utilise comme stationnement (a discuter). Le logement est situe dans le quartier Place St-Henri. Il est accesible par transport en commun, le bus 191 direction Dorval, 36 direction Angrignon et 78 direction Angrignon. Cela prend 5 mins en bus, et 10 mins de marche de la station metro. Le logement est aussi situe a 5 mins du nouveau CUSM (Centre Universitaire de Sante McGill), aussi pres du Canal Lachine, de l'autoroute 20,15 et plus, de la Banque Desjardin, de Mcdonald, des depaneur, de Reno Depot, Super C, IGA, Pharmaprix et plus.<br /><br /><br />NON INCLUT: ELECTRICITE, CHAUFFAGE, EAU CHAUDE !!! (A VOS FRAIS!! )<br /><br />SVP contacter le (514 692-6952/text apres 5PM ou par courriel!<br />-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- <br />APARTMENT FOR RENT 3 1/2 NOVEMBER 2015<br /><br />***PEOPLE WITH JOBS ONLY***<br /><br />*PLEASE READ CAREFULLY TO AVOID USELESS CALLS*<br /><br />A very nice clean and spacious apartment that has been renovated, the floor are brand new, the door, the windows as well. The painting has been redone also. It possesses a close bedroom, a bathroom with a closet for electric appliances machinery (Washer / Dryer). A large spacious living room combined with the kitchen. There are no separate room as a Kitchen. In addition, there is a backyard, which can be used as parking (to be discused) The property is located in the Place St-Henri neighborhood. It is easily accessible by public transport, the bus 191 towards Dorval, 36 and 78 towards the direction Angrignon. It takes 5 mins by bus and 10 mins by walk from the metro station. The appartment is also located 5 mins away from New MUHC (McGill University Centre for Health), it is also located near the Lachine Canal, the Highway and 15, 20 and more, also the Desjardin Bank, Mcdonald's, depaneur, Reno Depot, Super C, IGA, Pharmaprix and more.<br /><br /><br />NOT INCLUDED: ELECTRICITY, HEATING, HOT WATER !!! (AT YOUR OWN COST !!)<br /><br />Please contact (514) 692-6952 / text after 5PM or by email!

Hardwood Flooring Throughout, 9 Foot Ceilings, Three Good Size Bedrooms, Walk To Subways, Yorkville & Bloor Boutiques Shopping, Whole Foods Grocery.Extras:1 Parking Spot & 1 Locker, 6 S/S Kitchen Aid Appliances, Washer/Dryer, Dishwasher, Integrated Microwave, **$$$ Spent On Upgrades**Spa/Pool/Cabanas/Dining Room/Gym And Billiards Room/2 Guest Suites/Library/Visitor Parking & 24Hr Concierge.</p><p>Applicant Requirements:</p><p>- $80,000+ salary (proof of income required - employment letter, pay stubs, or bank statements)<br />- 680 credit score or better (credit report)</p><p><br />For more information or to schedule a viewing, please REPLY to this post or call our office at (437) 886-4597 (local Toronto area code). Please include reference number (above), your full name, email address, and return phone number. Incomplete inquiries will not be facilitated.</p>
